T02n2914u_001:29: sahajasiddhir bhavet tasmāt [ avācyaṃ ] sahajaṃ smṛtaṃ ||2 ||

T02n2914u_001:47: khadhātāv iti padmeti jñānaṃ bhagam iti smṛtam |
T02n2914u_001:62: yathodayaṃ bhavet śūnyaṃ dvividhaṃ sahajaṃ sthitam ||5 ||
T02n2914u_001:69: yoṣitā tu bhavet prajñā upāyaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtam
T02n2914u_001:73: paścād anayor dvaividhyaṃ vivṛti [ saṃvṛti ] bhedataḥ ||6 ||
T02n2914u_001:80: pūṃṣi tāvat dvaividhyaṃ śukraṃ tasya sukhaṃ ca vā |
T02n2914u_001:84: prajñāyām api yathā pūṃsi śukraṃ tasya sukhaṃ ca vā ||7 ||

T02n2914u_001:133: [ prathamaṃ ] uṣmāyate prajñā dvitīyaṃ dhūma [ va ] tī bhavet |
T02n2914u_001:137: tṛtīye tyajati sphalī caturthe jvalitā yathā ||11 ||

T02n2914u_001:148: dahati locanādīn dagdhe ham sravate śaśī ||12 ||

T02n2914u_001:166: rūpaṃ śabdaḥ tathā gandho [ ra ] saḥ sparśas tathaiva ca | ( 2 )
T02n2914u_001:190: nānyena kathayate sahajaṃ na kasminn api labhyate |
T02n2914u_001:221: sarve tāni samānī [ ti ] draṣṭavyāni tattvabhāvanaiḥ ||1 ||
T02n2914u_001:228: hīnaṃ sukṣmapadārthaṃ tu utkṛṣṭaṃ bhāvam ucyate |
T02n2914u_001:243: [ samā ] ni tulya ceṣṭāni samarasaṃ tattvabhāvanaiḥ ||3 ||
T02n2914u_001:250: samaṃ tulyaṃ ity uktaṃ ta [ d e ] vaikarasaṃ smṛtam |
T02n2914u_001:265: kulasevā [ = vayā ] bhavet siddhiḥ sarvakāmapradā śubhā ||5 || ( 3 )
T02n2914u_001:282: amoghaś ca tathā proktā sattvānāṃ siddhihetunā ||6 ||
T02n2914u_001:289: akṣobhyaḥ vajram ity uktaṃ amitābha padmam eva ca |
T02n2914u_001:293: ratnasaṃbhavaḥ ratnaṃ vairocana tathāgata [ ś ca ] ||7 ||
T02n2914u_001:300: amoghaḥ karma ity uktam kulāny etāni saṃkṣipet |
T02n2914u_001:311: trāse na rocate loke hakārādikulāni tu |
T02n2914u_001:315: mūḍhānām upadeśo hi prakopāya na śāntaye ||9 ||
T02n2914u_001:322: hevajro jñāyate tena śraddhayā vā śrute sati |
T02n2914u_001:337: [ sahajatvāt dvidhā ] bhedāt pañcapañca pṛthak pṛthak ||11 ||
T02n2914u_001:348: nakārād eko bhayād vā gupta lokapravādataḥ ||12 ||
T02n2914u_001:355: bāhye kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ ca śuklavarṇaṃ raktaṃ ca |
T02n2914u_001:366: sahajasaṃgataṃ hi jagat sarvaṃ yad uta bhuvanatrayam |
T02n2914u_001:370: tenaiva vyāpitaṃ [ sarvaṃ ] pānamaḥ ya jagat ||14 ||
T02n2914u_001:377: evaṃ matvā tu yogī ahaṃ etādṛśo dhruvam ( 4 )
